channel.title: Selling Charms (Read for more info)
channel.description:
For anybody who wants to get some charms for summoning with minimal effort, I'll be selling charms at Rock Lobsters. If you don't get how you can sell charms, you simply lootshare them and buy them later. I will be charging the costs of supplies (prayer potions + runes) with an additional 500gp per crimson and 1000gp per blue charm. For a comparison of prices, most people sell crimsons at 10-15k and blues at 20-25k. Why am I giving you guys such a good deal? Well, I figured I'd make a Moparscape exclusive ;) Rune costs shouldn't get too high considering I'm using a Staff of Light and Battle Robes (my rune usage is essentially cut by 2/3).
If you are interested, please PM me [b]both ingame and on here![/b] My ingame name is [b]Eq[u][i]v[/i][/u]ilibrate[/b] (underlined the v to avoid confusion). I want PMs on here to both verify that you are in fact a member of Moparscape and to make a list of who wants charms. First come, first serve.
If you don't know how to get to Rock lobsters or simply want me to bring you there, I'll charge another 3000gp. You will also need to bring a ranged weapon yourself, as I only plan to bring a blisterwood stake as mine.
Aside from that, you're all set! I'll give you further details ingame when its your turn :) I will also try to update this thread for when I'm available to sell charms. I will not be available for most of the day (due to school, track, sleep or dinner usually), but when I am available, I'll do my best to keep this up to date.
[u][b][size=10pt]PAYMENT:[/size][/b][/u] Just to clarify how payment for this works: -When paying for casts, you will simply pay in Death Runes or coins. You will pay me enough death runes to cover my usage or coins equal to the death rune's cost. -When paying for charms, please pay AFTER you think you've gotten enough. I will be keeping track of charm drops though, so don't lie about them (especially when they are less than 1/20 of the usual price). You will pay for them THERE. There is a reason for the safe spot :P
[b][size=18pt]I am currently [u]AVAILABLE[/u][/size][/b]. Please PM me HERE so I can set up.

item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach

Make it so only general+ can recieve loots, join his fc and watch him get loots x]

Read full topic

item.title: Selling Charms (Read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Oh believe me, its worth it. For my friend Dan however, not so worth it considering his LSP is still shit from revenants

Read full topic

@Loveandpower wrote:

^ so in retrospect…not worth it <3

Read full topic

item.title: Selling Charms (Read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

You really can’t guarantee it, David, but you can greatly increase the buyer’s odds by either my receiving of a high-value drop from lootshare, or the buyer missing a high-value drop from lootshare. If the buyer recently received a good drop from lootshare, it wouldn’t be worth it to try and buy charms as they’d rarely ever get any

Read full topic

item.title: Selling Charms (Read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I don’t understand how lootshare works, etc, but in regards to the thread, why are you guys giving rip4d crap when he’s trying to help out? It’s a bit baffling to me…

Read full topic

item.title: Selling Charms (Read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Yea, I agree with you. But quick question: how do you guarantee the other person gets the charms from lootshare?

Read full topic

item.title: Selling Charms (Read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

If this is deemed not allowed I won’t have much of an issue. If need be I can simply clarify the payment process in the main post and it should clear up any confusion with the possibility of being scammed (and the buyer cannot be scammed in the payment method I’m using; payment comes after delivery). If I’m scammed then oh well, it’s just a few runes and fist of guthix games

Read full topic

item.title: Selling Charms (Read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I know for a fact he was giving an except with lending with the in-game system because you can’t be scammed, so I’m assuming he meant the same for in-game trades.

[quote=“the elve age, post:9, topic:442874”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=545558.msg3998932#msg3998932 date=1337661628]

This is in game… Our rule is only about RWT…
[/quote]Well, I wouldn’t go QUITE that far, but yes, in-game trades are allowed. Basically as long as there is no risk of scamming.
[/quote]Well according to the rules that’s false.

I don’t really care at all, but we should change the rules then.

  1. No buying or selling of anything.[/quote]If you read the forum rules it’s pretty clear that it’s about RWT, and that rule was just a restatement. Rule #2 clearly says that in-game methods are the exception.

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:20, topic:440684”][quote author=ultimatepkvillage link=topic=543359.msg3982857#msg3982857 date=1335491216]

Pretty sure that only applies to real world trading.

@Davidi2 When were we able to do that? because according to Moparisthebest you can’t sell or buy anything from the rules he put on this section.

You can make legitimate in game trades to others, just be advised if you get scammed by another forum member the staff will not get involved.[/quote]^Global moderator

I will specifically ask MITB though, and if he agrees we can clarify the rule.

Read full topic
